name: UltraBook Pro 15
description: High-performance laptop with 15.6-inch 4K display, Intel i9 processor, 32GB RAM, 1TB SSD. Perfect for professionals and content creators. Features include: Thunderbolt 4 ports, Wi-Fi 6E, up to 12 hours battery life, backlit keyboard, and fingerprint reader.
specifications: Processor: Intel Core i9-12900H, RAM: 32GB DDR5, Storage: 1TB NVMe SSD, Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060, Display: 15.6" 4K OLED

name: SmartPhone X Pro
description: Latest flagship smartphone with 6.7-inch AMOLED display, 5G connectivity, triple camera system (108MP main + 12MP ultra-wide + 10MP telephoto), 12GB RAM, 256GB storage. IP68 water resistant with wireless charging support.
specifications: Display: 6.7" AMOLED 120Hz, Chipset: Snapdragon 8 Gen 2, Battery: 5000mAh, Cameras: 108MP+12MP+10MP

name: Wireless Noise-Cancelling Headphones
description: Premium over-ear headphones with active noise cancellation, 40mm drivers, 30-hour battery life, multi-device connectivity. Includes carrying case and audio cable for wired use.
specifications: Driver Size: 40mm, Battery: 30 hours, Bluetooth: 5.2, ANC: Adaptive, Weight: 250g

name: 4K Smart TV 55-inch
description: 55-inch LED smart TV with 4K UHD resolution, HDR10+ support, built-in streaming apps (Netflix, YouTube, Amazon Prime), voice control compatibility, 3 HDMI ports, 2 USB ports.
specifications: Resolution: 3840x2160, Refresh Rate: 60Hz, Smart Platform: WebOS, Ports: 3x HDMI 2.1, 2x USB

name: Gaming Console NextGen
description: Latest generation gaming console with 4K gaming at 120fps, 1TB SSD storage, ray tracing support, backward compatibility with previous generation games. Includes wireless controller.
specifications: GPU: 12 TFLOPS, Storage: 1TB NVMe SSD, Resolution: Up to 8K, Frame Rate: Up to 120fps

name: Premium Cotton T-Shirt
description: 100% organic cotton crew neck t-shirt. Available in multiple colors (Black, White, Navy, Gray). Preshrunk fabric, reinforced stitching, tagless design for comfort. Machine washable.
specifications: Material: 100% Organic Cotton, Fit: Regular, Sizes: XS-XXL, Care: Machine wash cold

name: Denim Jeans Classic Fit
description: Classic fit denim jeans made from premium stretch denim. Five-pocket styling, zip fly with button closure. Available in multiple washes (Light Blue, Dark Blue, Black). Durable and comfortable for everyday wear.
specifications: Material: 98% Cotton, 2% Elastane, Fit: Classic, Sizes: 28-40 waist, Inseam: 30/32/34

name: Winter Puffer Jacket
description: Insulated puffer jacket with water-resistant outer shell, down alternative filling, detachable hood, zippered pockets. Perfect for cold weather. Available in Black, Navy, and Olive Green.
specifications: Material: Polyester shell, Down alternative fill, Water resistant: Yes, Sizes: XS-XXL

name: Running Shoes Pro
description: Performance running shoes with responsive cushioning, breathable mesh upper, durable rubber outsole. Designed for long-distance running with arch support and shock absorption. Available in multiple colors.
specifications: Upper: Mesh, Sole: Rubber, Drop: 10mm, Weight: 280g (size 9), Sizes: 6-14

name: Business Formal Shirt
description: Classic formal dress shirt with button-down collar, long sleeves, wrinkle-resistant fabric. Perfect for office wear. Available in White, Light Blue, and Pink. Machine washable, easy care.
specifications: Material: 60% Cotton, 40% Polyester, Fit: Slim/Regular, Sizes: S-XXL, Collar: 14.5-17.5

name: Robot Vacuum Cleaner
description: Smart robot vacuum with mapping technology, app control, automatic docking and charging, HEPA filter, works on hardwood and carpet. Scheduling feature and voice assistant compatibility.
specifications: Battery: 5200mAh, Run time: 120 min, Dustbin: 600ml, Connectivity: Wi-Fi, App: iOS/Android

name: Air Purifier with HEPA Filter
description: 3-stage air purifier with True HEPA filter, activated carbon filter, removes 99.97% of particles. Covers up to 500 sq ft, quiet operation, air quality indicator, timer function.
specifications: Coverage: 500 sq ft, CADR: 230 mÂ³/h, Noise: 25-50 dB, Filter life: 6-8 months

name: Smart Thermostat
description: Wi-Fi enabled smart thermostat with learning capabilities, energy usage reports, remote control via smartphone app, works with major HVAC systems. Easy installation with C-wire adapter included.
specifications: Display: 3.3" color touchscreen, Connectivity: Wi-Fi 802.11, Compatibility: Most 24V HVAC systems

name: Cordless Stick Vacuum
description: Lightweight cordless vacuum cleaner with powerful suction, converts to handheld, LED headlights, washable filter. Up to 40 minutes runtime on single charge. Includes multiple attachments.
specifications: Battery: Li-ion, Runtime: 40 min, Charge time: 3.5 hours, Weight: 2.5 kg, Dustbin: 0.5L

name: Electric Coffee Maker
description: Programmable coffee maker with 12-cup capacity, brew strength selector, auto shut-off, permanent filter included. Features include: 24-hour programming, pause and serve, warming plate.
specifications: Capacity: 12 cups, Power: 900W, Programmable: Yes, Auto shut-off: 2 hours

name: Yoga Mat Premium
description: Extra thick (6mm) yoga mat with non-slip texture, eco-friendly TPE material, lightweight and portable. Includes carrying strap. Perfect for yoga, pilates, and floor exercises.
specifications: Thickness: 6mm, Material: TPE, Size: 183cm x 61cm, Weight: 1kg, Colors: Multiple

name: Camping Tent 4-Person
description: Spacious 4-person camping tent with waterproof rainfly, mesh windows for ventilation, easy setup with color-coded poles. Includes carrying bag and stakes. Floor size: 8ft x 7ft.
specifications: Capacity: 4 person, Floor: 8x7 ft, Height: 5.5 ft, Material: Polyester, Waterproof: 1500mm

name: Adjustable Dumbbells Set
description: Space-saving adjustable dumbbell set, weight range 5-52.5 lbs per dumbbell, quick-adjust dial system. Replaces 15 sets of weights. Includes storage tray.
specifications: Weight range: 5-52.5 lbs each, Increments: 2.5 lbs, Material: Steel and plastic

name: Mountain Bike 27.5-inch
description: Aluminum frame mountain bike with 21-speed Shimano drivetrain, front suspension fork, disc brakes, 27.5-inch wheels. Suitable for trails and off-road riding.
specifications: Frame: Aluminum, Gears: 21-speed, Brakes: Disc, Wheel size: 27.5", Weight: 14kg

name: Fitness Tracker Watch
description: Advanced fitness tracker with heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, step counter, calorie tracking, 14 sport modes. Water resistant (5ATM), 7-day battery life, smartphone notifications.
specifications: Display: 1.4" AMOLED, Battery: 7 days, Water resistance: 5ATM, Sensors: HR, Accelerometer, GPS
